remarks: Cancellation law for subtraction ( ~ pncan analog).  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.)
statement:
grpsubadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grppncan $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .- Y ) = X ) $.
